snippet.title: Last Christmas (GAME JAM VERSION) Full Trailer
snippet.description:
Last Christmas (GAME JAM VERSION) was made in 2 weeks for Adventure Jam 2022.

Last Christmas is a classical style Point and Click Adventure Game, but things aren't what they seem when Frankie tries to prepare a perfect Christmas for his girlfriend Betty in the family cabin in hills. Help him complete his tasks and watch out for an unexpected visitor.

Free Play the Game Jam Version here 
Download Here @ https://polytelygames.itch.io/last-christmas
FULL GAME ON STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2129020/Last_Christmas/
